statements: SELECT * FROM Invoices
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Invoices
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT total_amount, customer_name FROM Invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, invoice_date FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, customer_name ASC
SELECT invoice_id, customer_name FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount < 500 OR invoice_date < '2021-06-01'
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM Invoices
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM receipts ORDER BY receipt_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM receipts WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, customer_name FROM invoices WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT invoice_id, customer_name, DATE_FORMAT(invoice_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM invoices WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE paid_amount < 5000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY receipt_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, MAX(paid_amount) AS max_payment FROM receipts GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY max_payment DESC
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM invoice_items WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT invoice_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM receipts GROUP BY invoice_id HAVING total_payment > 500;
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC, invoice_date ASC
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT invoice_id, item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM invoice_items ORDER BY item_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT receipt_id, payment_method, payment_amount FROM receipts WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT invoices.invoice_id, invoices.total_amount, receipts.payment_amount FROM invoices INNER JOIN receipts ON invoices.invoice_id = receipts.invoice_id WHERE invoices.customer_id = 2
SELECT * FROM invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT receipt_id, receipt_date, total_amount FROM receipts WHERE receipt_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM invoice_items WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM invoices ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM invoice_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT receipts.receipt_id, invoices.total_amount FROM receipts INNER JOIN invoices ON receipts.customer_id = invoices.customer_id;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM payments WHERE method_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM invoices LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM invoice_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY unit_price;
SELECT amount_paid, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount AS amount_due FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT i.customer_name, SUM(ii.quantity) AS total_items FROM invoices i JOIN invoice_items ii ON i.invoice_id = ii.invoice_id GROUP BY i.customer_name ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.invoice_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT r.paid_by, SUM(r.amount_received) AS total_received FROM receipts r JOIN invoices i ON r.invoice_id = i.invoice_id WHERE i.total_amount > 1000 GROUP BY r.paid_by HAVING total_received > 5000 ORDER BY total_received DESC;
